conversations.english: I'm busy year in and year out, but now I've done nothing.
conversations.chinese: 我忙了一年又一年，但是现在我还是一事无成。
conversations.reply_english: You've done a lot, my darling!
conversations.reply_chinese: 你已经做了很多事了，亲爱的！

conversations.english: You didn't ring me last night. You said you would.
conversations.chinese: 你昨晚没有打电话给我。你说你会打的。
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry to have made you disappointed.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对不起，我让你失望了。

title: 我真想搬家 I’m itching for moving

conversations.english: I’m itching for moving!
conversations.chinese: 我真想搬家！
conversations.reply_english: What’s the matter? What annoy you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 怎么了？什么惹着你了？

title: 我的身体情况很糟糕In pretty bad shape

conversations.english: Why do you look so sad?
conversations.chinese: 怎么看上去你这么难过？
conversations.reply_english: I’m in pretty bad shape. I am having an allergy all the time.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我情况很糟，一直过敏。

conversations.english: Quite a few times, I had my back to the wall.
conversations.chinese: 有好几次，我都陷入绝境。
conversations.reply_english: Really? Generally they will turn out to be a good thing.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？通常结果证明是好事。

title: 马克又在卖弄他的学问了

conversations.english: Mark is parade his knowledge again.
conversations.chinese: 马克又在卖弄他的学问了。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah! He’s very good at showing off his knowledge.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，他总是很擅长善于炫耀。

title: 我希望你不要那么自私

conversations.english: I wish you would not be so selfish.
conversations.chinese: 我希望你不要那么自私。
conversations.reply_english: Selfishness is one human beings instincts. It is very difficult to get it out root and branch.
conversations.reply_chinese: 自私是人类的本性之一，想连根拔除是非常难的。

title: 居然停电了我的电脑内容没存档

conversations.english: Ah! No! Damn it!
conversations.chinese: 啊！不！该死！
conversations.reply_english: It's a blackout. Now I can't see Seinfeld.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是停电，现在我看不到喜剧片圣斐德了。

conversations.english: Saying you want to kill yourself, you terrified me out of my wits.
conversations.chinese: 你说你想自杀，吓死我了。
conversations.reply_english: I was playing a joke on you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在跟你开玩笑。

title: 让人觉得难受 It set my teeth on edge

conversations.english: I feel so uncomfortable.
conversations.chinese: 我觉得不舒服。
conversations.reply_english: Are you sick?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你生病了吗？

title: 爸爸总是偏袒迪克Takes side with Dick

conversations.english: The trouble is not that. It is that he may suddenly remember something I promised him a couple of weeks ago, out of a clear blue sky. Then he complains that I have gone back on my words.
conversations.chinese: 麻烦不是这个，而在于他会突然想起几个星期前我对他的承诺。然后就抱怨我言而无信。
conversations.reply_english: Does he do that with his Dad? I mean, does he complain things to his father?
conversations.reply_chinese: 他对父亲也是这样吗？我的意思是，他向父亲抱怨吗？

title: 我有很多烦心事Many things are troubling me

conversations.english: You seem to be very hesitant about doing things.
conversations.chinese: 你似乎有事有点犹豫不决。
conversations.reply_english: I don't know why I cannot take a step forward.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不知道为何我做事就是没有进展。

title: 我们的房子太小了 Our house is too small

conversations.english: Our house is too small. We had better have a big one.
conversations.chinese: 我们的房子太小了。我们最好能有一座大的。
conversations.reply_english: How could we ever manage to buy a big house when we are always living beyond our means?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们总是入不敷出，怎么可能买栋大房子呢？

title: 他确实让我失望Let me down

conversations.english: That’s really a let-down.
conversations.chinese: 那真是令人大失所望。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. He really does let me down.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，他确实让我失望。

conversations.english: What is wrong with your face?
conversations.chinese: 你的脸怎么了？
conversations.reply_english: My brother did it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我哥干的。

conversations.english: You're late.
conversations.chinese: 你迟到了。
conversations.reply_english: I know I'm late. I'm sorry.I tried to call you to tell you, but your phone seems to be disconnected.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道我迟到了，很抱歉。我试过打电话告诉你，但是你的电话好像不通。

conversations.english: I just don't understand why we have to take the subway. Look at this place. It's modern enough. But it's far from lively.
conversations.chinese: 我只是不明白我们为什么一定要搭地铁。看看这个地方。够现代的。但是没有活力。
conversations.reply_english: It's convenient. People in NewYork go everywhere by subway if they don't drive.
conversations.reply_chinese: 搭地铁方便。纽约人去哪里都是搭地铁，如果他们不开车的话。

conversations.english: Excuse me, I wonder if you could help me?
conversations.chinese: 对不起，我可以请你帮个忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of course, what can I do for you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，有什么我可以帮忙的？

conversations.english: You know, I am really nervouse flying these days.
conversations.chinese: 你知道吗，我最近坐飞机都很紧张。
conversations.reply_english: Really! Security has improved a lot,don't you think?
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗，飞安跟以前比起来进步太多了，你不觉得吗？

conversations.english: Hello, Is this EYG computers?
conversations.chinese: 喂，这里是EYG电脑公司吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeas, It is.Sewen jes speaking.How can I help?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的,我是Sewen jes。有什么我可以为你服务？

title: 我想我俩都与幸运无缘

conversations.english: Maybe you'll get another chance at the statue.
conversations.chinese: 或许你还有别的机会得到这尊佛像。
conversations.reply_english: I don't think so. Did you ever go and look at your stamp?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不这么认为。那你有去看看你的邮票吗？

conversations.english: Excuse me! I don't have time to waste. I've been here almost one full hour!
conversations.chinese: 不好意思！我没时间在这儿耗了。我已在这里等了快整整一个小时了！
conversations.reply_english: Sorry, madam. You have to wait your turn. The parking lot is full.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真抱歉，太太。您必须等轮到您才行。停车场已经满了。

conversations.english: On, darn. The grocery store is closed.
conversations.chinese: 噢，该死。杂货店关门了。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, this one closes at ten. We could drive to the 24-hour store on sixth.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是呀，这家商店10点关门。我们可以开车到第6大街的24小时营业店去买。

conversations.english: I Don't know how they do it! Our competitors have undercut us by 10% percent on the price of our latest model. There is no way will be able to compete against that. We're barely breaking even with the present prices.
conversations.chinese: 我真不知道他们是怎么搞的!我们的竞争对手的价格比我们最新一款的产品价格低10%.那样我们根本不可能与他们竞争.就目前的价位我们刚刚能维持不赢不亏.
conversations.reply_english: These price wars are disastrous for our bottom line. If they're charging 10% less than we are, we've got to find a way to lower our price while keeping our profit.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这些价格战对我们底线的影响是灾难性的.如果他们比我们的要价低10%,那我们只能在维持利润的同事找到一种降低价格的办法.

conversations.english: Is anything the matter, sir?
conversations.chinese: 有什么事吗，先生？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it's my steak.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，是我的牛排。

conversations.english: You won’t believe who’s been elected to do overtime on the Baker account! Me! I’ve already logged in 20 hours of overtime!
conversations.chinese: 你想象不到谁被选中加班做贝克项目了。我！我已经加了20小时班了。
conversations.reply_english: Wow! Why so much? I thought they were getting you an assistant.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哇！怎么这么长啊？我以为他们要给你派名助手呢！

title: 我们上礼拜不是看过了吗

conversations.english: Let's skip The X-files tonight, Fran. Okay? Just this once?
conversations.chinese: 法兰，我们今天晚上跳过《X档案》不看好不好？就这么一次啦？
conversations.reply_english: Let me guess. You want to watch the History Channel again!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我来猜猜看。你又想要看历史频道了吧！

conversations.english: You look really wiped out?
conversations.chinese: 你看起来真的是筋疲力尽了。
conversations.reply_english: I had meetings back to back all morning. And phone rang off the hook from the minute I walked into the office.
conversations.reply_chinese: 整个早上我有背靠背的会议。从我走进办公室那一刻开始电话就响个不停。

conversations.english: I can't wait until my car is repaired. The commuting with public transportation is killing me.
conversations.chinese: 我真希望我的车能早点修好.坐公共交通工具上下班会把我累死的.
conversations.reply_english: It can't be that bad.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没那么糟糕吧.

conversations.english: Are you working overtime again? Over the last two weeks, you have worked overtime every day without a break! Your company is draining the life out of you!
conversations.chinese: 你又加班了?在过去的两周里,你们每天加班一点儿也没休息过.你们公司想累死你们啊!
conversations.reply_english: I know, but I don't have a choice, my boss has complete control over our work schedules.I haven't made it out of the office before 9 PM a single day this week.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道,可是我没选择.我的老板完全控制着我们的工作安排.我这周就没有一天不是晚上9点以后下班的.

conversations.english: Hi, Lander. What's wrong?
conversations.chinese: 嗨,蓝德,怎么了?
conversations.reply_english: I can hardly make ends meet these days.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我都快入不敷出了.

conversations.english: Have you followed the value of dollar lately?
conversations.chinese: 最近你注意美元的价格了吗?
conversations.reply_english: How could I help but follow it? The fluctuation of dollar is killing my company! The exchange rates are eating into our profits, and we can't do anything about it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我怎么能不关心呢?美元的价格波动快要把我们的公司搞垮了!汇率变化耗掉了我们的利润,而且我们对此毫无办法.

conversations.english: I always think everybody looks down on me
conversations.chinese: 我总觉得大家都看不起我。
conversations.reply_english: Don't be that negative.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不要那样消极。

title: 为什么不直接回答我的问题

conversations.english: Did you go to the bank to withdraw money?
conversations.chinese: 你去银行取钱了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Today is so hot, besides I had so much housework to do. My friend came for a visit and stayed for two hours. I didn’t forget, but I had no time at all.
conversations.reply_chinese: 今天很热，而且我有很多家务要做。我的朋友来玩，还呆了两个小时。我是没忘记，但我根本就没有时间。

conversations.english: Crazy!He locked himself in the room.
conversations.chinese: 真奇怪！他把自己锁在了屋里。
conversations.reply_english: I think he was locked in it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我认为他是被锁在了屋子里。

title: 哲学课实在是太枯燥了

conversations.english: To be frank,I find philosophy rather boring.
conversations.chinese: 老实说，我觉得哲学太枯燥了。
conversations.reply_english: To tell you the truth,it's the most tediouse course I have ever had.
conversations.reply_chinese: 说实话，这是我上过的最烦人的课了。

title: 这座房子环境太糟糕了

conversations.english: What a terrible house!
conversations.chinese: 房子太糟糕了！
conversations.reply_english: I'm sick of it,too.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也讨厌透了。

conversations.english: Henry,do you know how much we spent this month?
conversations.chinese: 亨利，你知道这个月花了多少钱吗？
conversations.reply_english: No,I'm not clear.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不清楚。

conversations.english: Wow! What happened to you? You look sad.
conversations.chinese: 哇！你怎么了，你看起来很伤心。
conversations.reply_english: I just lost my job. My boss just told me.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我刚丢了工作，老板刚刚才告诉我的。

conversations.english: Hey, Mary, can you cut that out?
conversations.chinese: 你好，玛丽，你能停下来吗？
conversations.reply_english: Cut what out I’m not doing anything.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我什么都没做。

conversations.english: I don't think the lecture is very interesting.
conversations.chinese: 我觉得这个讲座没意思。
conversations.reply_english: The lecturer is dull,too.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那演讲人也太呆板了。

title: 我的弟弟成天游手好闲

conversations.english: I didn't like my brother's batting around without doing anything useful.
conversations.chinese: 我不喜欢我的弟弟成天游游逛逛而什么正经事情也不做。
conversations.reply_english: Maybe he is trying to find a job. When he finds one, everything will be settled.
conversations.reply_chinese: 或许他正在努力找工作，找到工作什么事情就解决了。

title: 厌烦了那样无聊的工作

conversations.english: Oh, my God. I can't take it any more.
conversations.chinese: 噢，我的天哪，再不能忍受了。
conversations.reply_english: What's wrong, honey? Take it easy.
conversations.reply_chinese: 怎么啦，亲爱的？放松点。

conversations.english: Hurry up! Time is money!
conversations.chinese: 快点！时间就是金钱。
conversations.reply_english: Don't build a fire under me. I know the importance of time.
conversations.reply_chinese: 别催我，我知道时间的重要性。

conversations.english: Finding an excuse is obviously down your alley. And trying to avoid taking care of the children is what you are good at.
conversations.chinese: 你最擅长的就是找借口。不去照顾孩子也是你的专利。
conversations.reply_english: Listen, Nancy. If I don't work hard, I will be laid off.
conversations.reply_chinese: 听着，Nancy。如果我不去工作的话就会下岗。

conversations.english: I don't know what I can do now. I'm down and out.
conversations.chinese: 我现在不知道怎么办。我穷困潦倒。
conversations.reply_english: You are not the gray train, I guess. But bite the bullet and you'll soon be in the chips again.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想你现在有很大的挣钱的机会，要紧牙关挺住，会有钱的。

conversations.english: Why are you so rude to your wife?
conversations.chinese: 你为什么对你的妻子这么无礼粗鲁。
conversations.reply_english: I didn't like her butting in where I didn't want her. She's a chatter box.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不喜欢他干涉我的事情，她老是唠唠叨叨的讲个不停。

title: 儿子抱怨我对他太挑剔了

conversations.english: My son is alway complaining that I dump on him. He was very rude and told me to mind my own business. I cannot put up with that.
conversations.chinese: 我的儿子总是抱怨我对他太挑剔了，他很不客气，让我管好自己就行了，我真是受不了。
conversations.reply_english: What does his dad say?
conversations.reply_chinese: 他爸爸怎么说的？

title: 邻居家的录音机烦死人了

conversations.english: Our neighbour’s tape recorder is so loud that it annoys us to death. I’ve made up my mind to cut the electricity off.
conversations.chinese: 我们邻居的录音机太响了，我们烦死了。我决定割断电线。
conversations.reply_english: What? That would be to cut off your nose to spite your face.
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么？那不是反害了自己。

title: 父母总是对孩子发牢骚

conversations.english: I don't understand why some parents keep beefing and complaining about their daughters not being able to follow suit.
conversations.chinese: 我真搞不懂为什么有些父母总是不停地发牢骚，抱怨他们的女儿们不学他们的榜样。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. Li Na's mother has been building a fire under her since her neighbour's daughter got married with a Canadian. She's almost driving Li Na crazy.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，自从李娜邻居的女儿嫁给了一个意大利人，她妈妈就不停地对她紧催快赶。她很快把李娜逼疯了。

title: 我的婆婆总是挑我的理

conversations.english: Hi, Becky, what's up?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，贝基，有什么事吗？
conversations.reply_english: Not much, except that my mother-in-law is driving me up the wall.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没什么，只是我婆婆让我气愤。

conversations.english: It’s really terrible!
conversations.chinese: 真是太糟糕了。
conversations.reply_english: What are you talking about?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你在说什么呀？

title: 洗衣机大幅度促销广告

conversations.english: What a washing machine! It’s getting worse today. Look! Now it doesn’t work at all. I think I need a new one.
conversations.chinese: 这台倒霉的洗衣机！今天更坏得不行了！你看，现在根本就不转了。我想该买台新的了。
conversations.reply_english: Here’s an ad. about a big sale of washing machine. Do you want to see it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这有一张关于洗衣机大幅度促销的广告。想看看吗？

conversations.english: Sally, I’m tired of this Western food. I really miss my mother’s Sichuan cooking.
conversations.chinese: 莎利，这些西餐我真吃腻了。我真想念我妈妈做的四川菜。
conversations.reply_english: I’m sure you do miss that type of cooking. But can’t you try to get used to Western food?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道你肯定很想念那种口味的菜。但是你难道不能试着适应吃西餐吗？

conversations.english: So Kim, have you ever had anything stolen?
conversations.chinese: 那么，金，你有没有被偷过东西？
conversations.reply_english: Stolen? No, why?
conversations.reply_chinese: 被偷过？没有，问这干什么？

conversations.english: I’m sick of my job, I always have to work late at night, and the company keeps me working in the office.
conversations.chinese: 我很讨厌我的工作，我得经常晚上工作到很晚，公司又老是让我在办公室工作。
conversations.reply_english: Why don’t you find a new career where you can do what you enjoy, being outside working during the day？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你为什么不找一个新工作，那样你就可以做你喜欢做的；白天在户外工作？

conversations.english: You're being childish. Your nose will heal. And so will your pride, if you let it.
conversations.chinese: 你这是在闹小孩子脾气。你鼻子的伤会好。你受损的自尊也是，就看你自己要不要。
conversations.reply_english: I'll have us ready for Stars.com by the end of next week. After that, I don't know.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们下星期之前，就会把给Stars.com的东西准备好。之后的事，我就不知道了。
